Exploring Your Relationship with The Earth

As we face the truth about our global crisis and the devastating impact of climate change, it is clear that we, as human inhabitants of this planet, now find ourselves at a critical point where our survival depends on our ability and willingness to develop a healthy, balanced and sustainable relationship with the Earth Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the Mother of Us All.

Combining shamanic rhythm & sounds, verbal guidance, chanting and Field Effect Audio Technology, Earth Om Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Sacred Resonance provides a gentle and powerful heart-centered journey of self-discovery into your relationship with Mother Earth.
